text:
This week's video is going to be a little
bit different.

This week is World Storytelling Day, and JenniferESL
had the idea to bring together a bunch of

different YouTube English teachers to tell
a story.

So as you listen to the story piece by piece
told by different teachers, pay attention

What are these new vocabulary words and how
are they pronounced?

You'll also hear Gabby of GoNatrualEnglish
say "WhatsApp".

I had a question once from somebody, saying,
"What's the difference in pronunciation between

So at the end of the story, you will get a
little video from me telling you the difference
in pronunciation in these two phrases.
Let's get started with the story!
